citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
The written program of veterinary care was not available for review at time of the inspection . The formal
arrangements with the attending veterinarian must include a written program of vet care.
CORRECT BY : 9-4-14
The records inspection and exit briefing was conducted with the owner.

narrative:
2.40(a)(1)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
The written program of veterinary care was not available for review at time of the inspection . The formal
arrangements with the attending veterinarian must  include a written program of vet care. 
CORRECT BY : 9-4-14 
The records inspection and exit briefing was conducted with the owner.
